title: Part 3
subtitle: Meeting with the sage Atri and his hymn of praise to Śrī Rāma

title: Part 4
subtitle: Sītā's meeting with Anasuya (Atri's wife) and the latter's discourse on the duties of a devoted wife

title: Part 5
subtitle: Śrī Rāma proceeds further and kill Viradha; the episode of the sage Sarabhanga

title: Part 6
subtitle: Śrī Rāma takes a vow to kill the demons

title: Part 7
subtitle: Sutiksna's love and Śrī Rāma's meeting with the sage Agastya; dialogue with Agastya; Śrī Rāma's entry into the Daṇḍaka forest and His meeting with Jaṭāyu

title: Part 8
subtitle: The story of Śūrpaṇakhā; her approaching Khara, Dūṣaṇa and Trisira for redress and their subsequent death at Śrī Rāma's hands

title: Part 9
subtitle: Śūrpaṇakhā approaches Rāvaṇa; Sītā enters into the fire leaving Her shadow behind

title: Part 10
subtitle: The episode of Mārīca and how he was killed in the form of a gold deer

title: Part 12
subtitle: The combat of Jaṭāyu with Rāvaṇa

title: Part 13
subtitle: Śrī Rāma's lament; His meeting with Jaṭāyu

title: Part 14
subtitle: Grace on Śabarī; a discourse on the nine forms of Devotion and departure for the Pampa lake

title: Part 15
subtitle: A description of the spring; Nārada's meeting with Śrī Rāma

title: Part 16
subtitle: The glory of hearing the praises of Śrī Rāma and an exhortation to cultivate fellowship with saints and practise adoration
